Class GameState

Namespace
Pig.Core
Assembly
Pig.Core.dll

Represents an immutable snapshot of the Pig game state at a specific point in time.

public record GameState : IEquatable<GameState>
Inheritance
object
GameState
Implements
IEquatable<GameState>

object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

This record type ensures thread safety and state integrity by preventing modification after creation. Any change to the game state results in a new instance of this record via the 'with' expression.

Constructors

GameState(IReadOnlyList<PlayerState>, int, int, bool, string)

Represents an immutable snapshot of the Pig game state at a specific point in time.

public GameState(IReadOnlyList<PlayerState> Players, int CurrentPlayerIndex, int CurrentTurnScore, bool IsGameOver, string LastRollDescription)

Parameters

Players IReadOnlyList<PlayerState>

An immutable list of all participating players and their current total scores.

CurrentPlayerIndex int

The index of the player whose turn it currently is.

CurrentTurnScore int

The points accumulated in the current turn that have not yet been banked.

IsGameOver bool

A flag indicating whether a player has reached the winning score.

LastRollDescription string

A text-based summary of the most recent action for display in the UI.

Remarks

This record type ensures thread safety and state integrity by preventing modification after creation. Any change to the game state results in a new instance of this record via the 'with' expression.
